      • CompositeXMLDocument

        public CompositeXMLDocument(XMLDocument base,
                            Map<String,? extends XMLDocument> templates)
                     throws DocumentException
        Construct a new CompositeXMLDocument using the provided base document as the root and the provided templates as inserted content.
        Parameters:
        base - the root document to insert into
        templates - a mapping of insertion point labels to documents to insert
        Throws:
        DocumentException - if an error occured building the composite document

      • toJDOMDocument

        public JDOMDocument toJDOMDocument(File newFile)
                            throws FileNotFoundException,
                                   IOException,
                                   DocumentException
        Flattens the composite document into a normal JDOMDocument assigning the systemId to the new file location.
        Parameters:
        newFile - the file to write the composite document to
        Returns:
        a new document instance
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the target file cannot be opened for writing for some reason
        IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the file
        DocumentException - if an error occurs while loading the newly written file
